title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Park City, Utah
content:
Photo submitted by Tom LeRoy, “I hadn’t seen my son in 9 months so we were super excited to meet in Park City to hang out and ride some gravel…which almost didn’t happen as he had a catastrophic bottom bracket failure that wasn’t fixed until the night before he had to leave Wyoming.  This pic

author: Kristi Benedict
